Class LocalNodeList

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.hanukcoin.node.LocalNodeList

  • public class LocalNodeList
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores a HashMap of all nodes in the network.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Map<HostPortPair,Node> localList
      HashMap that stores all known nodes.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int countNewNodes() 
      static int countTrustedNodes() 
      static void deleteOldNodes()
      deletes nodes that were last seen more than 30 minutes ago

      Creates and stores initial node in the list

      loads nodes to localList from the file.

      calculates the sum of the lengths of the nodes in a HashMap
      private static int readInt(java.io.BufferedInputStream in)
      reads 4 bytes from in to an int. returns -1 if EOF reached.
      static void save()
      Saves localList to memory in the following format: for each node, at first will be 4 bytes describing its size, then 00000000 if old, 00000001 if new, and then the bytes corresponding to Node.getData()

      Updates current list with a new list according to the following rules specified here.

        Returns:

      • nodeListLengthSum

        public static int nodeListLengthSum(java.util.Map<HostPortPair,Node> nodeList)
        calculates the sum of the lengths of the nodes in a HashMap
        Parameters:
        nodeList - The list of nodes.
        Returns:
        sum of the lengths

      • save

        public static void save()
        Saves localList to memory in the following format: for each node, at first will be 4 bytes describing its size, then 00000000 if old, 00000001 if new, and then the bytes corresponding to Node.getData()

      • writeInt

        Writes 4 bytes to out, from num
        Parameters:

        num - An int representing the 4 bytes we want to write
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If unable to write to out

        loads nodes to localList from the file.

      • readInt

        private static int readInt(java.io.BufferedInputStream in)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        reads 4 bytes from in to an int. returns -1 if EOF reached.
        Parameters:
        in - an BufferedInputStream from which we read.
        Returns:
        The first 4 bytes as an int, -1 if EOF reached.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If unable to read from in

      • deleteOldNodes

        public static void deleteOldNodes()
        deletes nodes that were last seen more than 30 minutes ago
